name: Android-arabic-reader
tagline: Arabic Reader is an open source ePub/rtf/txt reader for android, based on FBReaderJ
body:
Android Arabic Reader
=====================

Arabic Reader is a free and open source eBook reader. Supports epub, rtf, doc (MS Word), html, fb2(.zip), mobi (including non-protected kindle books), and plain text file formats.
Arabic Reader is fast, highly customizable. Can use external TrueType/OpenType fonts and custom backgrounds. Screen brightness can be changed during reading (slide finger up/down along the left screen edge). Supports different day/night color schemes.

Based on FBReader, Arabic Reader fast and highly customizable - it can use external TrueType/OpenType fonts and custom backgrounds, the screen brightness can be adjusted while reading (slide finger up/down along the left screen edge), and different day/night color schemes can be selected.

[![Google Play](https://i.imgur.com/Xc1zlCX.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.sourceforge.arabicReader)
